The [93mstudy[0m was [93mperformed[0m on [93mWistar[0m [93mrats[0m. [93mSpontaneous[0m and [93magonist[0m-[93minduced[0m [93mcontractions[0m of the [93mcircular[0m [93msmooth[0m [93mmuscle[0m ([93mSM[0m) [93mpreparations[0m from the [93mgastric[0m [93mantrum[0m and the [93mcaecum[0m were [93mmeasured[0m in [93misometric[0m [93mmode[0m. [93mLipid[0m [93mfractions[0m and [93mfree[0m [93mamino[0m [93macids[0m in [93mblood[0m [93mplasma[0m were [93mdetermined[0m [93mchromatographically[0m. [93mMolecular[0m [93mdocking[0m of [93mGDNHs[0m to the [93mstructure[0m of the [93mmuscarinic[0m [93macetylcholine[0m [93mreceptor[0m was [93mperformed[0m [93musing[0m [93mblind[0m [93mrigid[0m [93mdocking[0m with [93mSmina[0m [93mosx[0m.[93m12[0m. It was [93mfound[0m that [93mintravenous[0m [93madministration[0m of [93mGDNHs[0m [93mgenerally[0m [93minduced[0m [91mchanges[0m in [93mspontaneous[0m [93mSM[0m [93mcontractile[0m [93mactivity[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mcontraction[0m [93mamplitude[0m and [93maltered[0m [93mfrequency[0m, [93mmodification[0m of [93mcontraction[0m-[93mrelaxation[0m [93mcycle[0m [93mdurations[0m and [93mvelocities[0m, and [93menhanced[0m [93mefficiency[0m [93mindices[0m. Under these [93mconditions[0m, [93mmechanisms[0m [93mregulating[0m and [93mmaintaining[0m [93mphysiologically[0m [93mrelevant[0m [93mdifferences[0m in the [93mmechanokinetic[0m [93mparameters[0m of [93mSM[0m [93mcontractions[0m [93macross[0m [93mdifferent[0m [93mdigestive[0m [93mtract[0m [93mregions[0m were [93malso[0m [93maltered[0m. [93mMoreover[0m, [93mGDNHs[0m [93mmodulated[0m the [93mmechanisms[0m of [93madrenergic[0m [93minhibition[0m and [93mcholinergic[0m [93mexcitation[0m in the [93mantrum[0m and [93mcaecum[0m . - [93mPressure[0m-[93mInduced[0m [93mEnhanced[0m [93mCovalency[0m [93mDifference[0m in the [93mCoordination[0m of [93mAm[0m([93mIII[0m)/[93mEu[0m([93mIII[0m) with an [93mUnsymmetric[0m [93mPhenanthroline[0m [93mExtractant[0m.: The [93minfluence[0m of [93mhigh[0m [93mpressure[0m on the [93mcoordination[0m [93mproperties[0m of [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mcompounds[0m is a [93mtopic[0m of [93mgrowing[0m [93minterest[0m, which [93mprovides[0m [93mpotential[0m [93mapplications[0m in the [93mseparation[0m of [93mactinide[0m (An [93m3[0m+ ) and [93mlanthanide[0m ([93mLn[0m [93m3[0m+ ) [93mions[0m.
